description:
Sometimes when I film I feel like I'm teaching two virgins how to fuck for the first time. Sometimes the videos just film themselves. This usually happens when two guys have a little experience under their belts, they're really horny, and they really want to have sex.
Tanner and Spence going at it definitely fell under the latter category. Spence just kind of took charge of the whole thing, and was trying out a lot of different positions with Tanner. Tanner loves to get fucked and he was feeling somewhat submissive that day so the stars just kind of aligned and I got to have fun just watching them get off!
title: Tanner & Spence
